steps.plaintext: Return to the base camp and ask the researchers for clues regarding the journal.
steps.markdown: Return to the base camp and ask the researchers for clues regarding the journal.

steps.plaintext: If any parts have not been collected, obtain the following steps:
steps.markdown: If any parts have not been collected, obtain the following steps:

substeps.plaintext: (If Part I is missing) Head for the "secret chamber" to search for journals
substeps.markdown: (If Part I is missing) Head for the "secret chamber" to search for journals

substeps.plaintext: (If Part II is missing) Go to the "cellar in the southwestern ruins" to search for journals
substeps.markdown: (If Part II is missing) Go to the "cellar in the southwestern ruins" to search for journals

substeps.plaintext: (If Part III is missing) Head to "South Base Camp" to search for journals
substeps.markdown: (If Part III is missing) Head to "South Base Camp" to search for journals

substeps.plaintext: If all three parts were collected before completing Step 1, the quest directly goes to Step 3.
substeps.markdown: If all three parts were collected before completing Step 1, the quest directly goes to Step 3.

steps.plaintext: Give the gathered journals to Stevens
